item.title: 现代汽车创纪录的印度首次公开募股上市前需求冷淡
item.description: 现代汽车公司印度分公司的首次公开募股耗资 33 亿美元，但在大盘走势疲软的情况下仍难以吸引投资者。【原文：The $3.3 billion initial public offering of Hyundai Motor Co.’s Indian unit has struggled to attract investors amid weakening sentiment in the broader market.】

item.title: 中国住建部简报要点
item.description: 以下是周四在中国举行的房地产市场简报会的主要内容，包括住房部长倪虹在内的发言人都发表了讲话：【原文：Here are the key takeaways from a briefing in China on Thursday on the property market, by speakers including Housing Minister Ni Hong:】

item.title: 意大利葡萄酒酿造商的未来再次面临威胁
item.description:
全国的葡萄园已经在努力应对气候的变化和口味的改变。借贷成本的飙升使他们的生活更加艰难。【原文：

The nation’s vineyards were already grappling with a changing climate and changing tastes. A spike in borrowing costs makes their lives even more difficult. 

】

item.title: 诺埃尔-塔塔在 36 小时内获得了最高职位。现在，他必须兑现承诺
item.description: 在元老拉坦-塔塔逝世仅 36 小时后，他的同父异母兄弟诺埃尔-塔塔（Noel Tata）就登上了最高职位，因为强大的塔塔信托基金（Tata Trusts）的受托人一致推举他为继任者。现在，他面临的挑战是领导一个价值 1,650 亿美元的帝国。【原文：Barely 36 hours after the demise of patriarch Ratan Tata, his half-brother Noel Tata cruised to the top job as the trustees of the powerful Tata Trusts unanimously voted him as the successor. Now he faces the challenge of steering a $165 billion empire.】

item.title: 欧洲央行将加快背靠背降息步伐：决策指南
item.description: 欧洲中央银行将在连续第二次会议上降低利率；在数据显示通胀迅速回落的同时经济也在恶化之后，欧洲中央银行将加快降息速度。【原文：The European Central Bank is set to lower interest rates for a second straight meeting — quickening the speed of cutting after data showed that the rapid retreat in inflation is being accompanied by a deteriorating economy.】

item.title: 北京住房简报会后铁矿石跌向 100 美元
item.description: 铁矿石跌至三周低点，这表明投资者怀疑中国支撑房地产市场的最新举措是否足以提振建筑活动和钢铁需求。【原文：Iron ore tumbled to a three-week low, a sign that investors doubt whether China’s latest moves to shore up the property market will do enough to boost construction activity and steel demand.】

item.title: 马来西亚预算案有望成为刺激债券反弹的催化剂
item.description: 投资者表示，马来西亚的主权债券和货币有望在强劲的经济指标和对即将到来的预算案中的财政纪律的预期下反弹。【原文：Malaysia’s sovereign bonds and currency are poised to rebound on robust economic indicators and expectations for fiscal discipline in the upcoming budget, investors said.】

item.title: 野村日本政府债券高级交易员泽田离职
item.description: 据知情人士透露，野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc.【原文：One of Nomura Holdings Inc.’s most senior Japanese government bond traders has left his role, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度节日季决定市场情绪
item.description: (彭博社）— 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：(Bloomberg) — Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 中国将对未竣工项目的支持提高至 5620 亿美元
item.description: 中国表示，将把支持 "白名单 "房地产项目的计划从已部署的约 2.23 万亿元人民币扩大到 4 万亿元人民币（合 5,620 亿美元），为阻止该行业的下滑增加更多弹药。【原文：China said it will expand a program to support “white list” property projects to 4 trillion yuan ($562 billion) from about 2.23 trillion yuan already deployed, adding more ammunition to halt the sector’s decline.】

item.title: 对冲基金千禧年向香港 Centerline 拨款
item.description: 千禧年管理有限责任公司（Millennium Management LLC）已同意向总部位于香港的中心线投资管理有限公司（Centerline Investment Management Ltd.）分派资金，这是一家多战略公司利用外部对冲基金经理帮助提高资产回报的最新例子。【原文：Millennium Management LLC has agreed to parcel out money to Hong Kong-based Centerline Investment Management Ltd., the latest example of a multi-strategy firm using external hedge fund managers to help bolster returns as assets expand.】

item.title: 中国股市上涨，关注住建部简报
item.description: 在联合部委就支持房地产市场的措施举行简报会之前，中国股市攀升。【原文：Chinese stocks climbed ahead of a joint ministry briefing on measures to support the property market.】

item.title: 中国开发商融创将通过增发配售融资 1.55 亿美元
item.description: 融创中国控股有限公司将通过配售融资约 12 亿港元（1.55 亿美元），这是该开发商一年来首次进行股权融资。【原文：Sunac China Holdings Ltd. will raise about HK$1.2 billion ($155 million) through placements, the first time in a year that the developer is doing an equity fundraising.】

item.title: 中国住建部与投资者举行吹风会，关注更多刺激措施
item.description: 2022年12月16日，星期五，中国北京，中国荣誉（Honor of China）项目在建住宅楼，该项目最初由违约的世茂集团控股有限公司开发，后出售给国有竞争对手华润置地有限公司。中国政府暗示将进一步支持房地产行业，一位高层决策者将其形容为世界第二大经济体的 "支柱"。【原文：Residential buildings under construction at the Honor of China project, originally developed by defaulted Shimao Group Holdings Ltd. before sold to state-owned rival China Resources Land Ltd., in Beijing, China, on Friday, Dec. 16, 2022. China's government hinted at further support for the real estate sector, with a top policy maker describing it as a "pillar" of the world's second-largest economy.】

item.title: 拥有 4000 亿美元资产的日本保险公司预测日经指数将创历史新高
item.description: 日本最大的人寿保险公司之一的市场主管预计，随着关键选举后政治不确定性的消退，日本股市将打破更多记录。【原文：A markets chief at one of Japan’s biggest life insurers is expecting the nation’s shares to break more records as political uncertainties fade after key elections.】

item.title: 交易商权衡中东风险和供应过剩，石油走高
item.description: 由于交易商权衡了中东潜在的供应风险和全球需求疲软的前景，石油价格上涨。【原文：Oil inched up as traders weighed potential supply risks from the Middle East against a weak outlook for global demand.】

item.title: 三星助推盘后韩元交易量翻番
item.description: 自 8 月份以来，韩元在延长时间内的交易量几乎翻了一番，这凸显了韩国在使全球投资者更容易进入其金融市场方面所取得的进展。【原文：The volume of trades in the South Korean won in extended hours almost doubled since August, underscoring the nation’s progress in making its financial market more accessible for global investors.】

item.title: Robinhood 计划为交易者提供期货和指数期权服务
item.description: Robinhood Markets 公司正在将其产品范围扩大到期货交易和指数期权，因为这家零售经纪公司希望吸引更多成熟的投资者加入其平台。【原文：Robinhood Markets Inc. is broadening its offerings to futures trading and index options as the retail brokerage aims to attract more sophisticated investors to its platform.】

item.title: 亚洲股市在美国小盘股反弹中上扬：市场综述
item.description: 在华尔街收盘走高后，亚洲股市早盘上涨，这主要得益于大盘股科技股的轮动上涨，以及包括小公司在内的经济敏感型股票的上涨。【原文：Equities in Asia braced for early gains after Wall Street closed higher, helped along by a rotation out of mega-cap tech and into economically sensitive shares including smaller companies.】

item.title: 氧化铝价格飙升提升利润，美国铝业股价大涨
item.description: 美国铝业公司（Alcoa Corp.）股价在尾盘跳涨多达 10%，原因是氧化铝价格强劲，使其季度盈利达到两年多来的最高点。【原文：Alcoa Corp. shares jumped as much as 10% in late trading as strong alumina prices boosted quarterly earnings to the highest in more than two years.】

item.title: 苹果公司与中国比亚迪秘密合作开发长续航电动汽车电池
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，苹果公司与中国汽车制造商比亚迪股份有限公司合作多年，作为其现已取消的汽车项目的一部分，开发了长距离电池，为今天所使用的技术奠定了基础。【原文：Apple Inc. worked with Chinese automaker BYD Co. for years as part of its now-canceled car project, developing long-range batteries that helped lay the groundwork for technology used today, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: Ventum Financial 因总裁离职而调整管理团队
item.description: Ventum Financial Corp.由两家较小的加拿大公司合并而成，成立不到四个月，Jean-Paul Bachellerie 就不再担任该公司总裁。【原文：Jean-Paul Bachellerie is out as president of boutique investment firm Ventum Financial Corp., less than four months after it was formed by the merger of two smaller Canadian companies.】

item.title: 摩根大通三位 CLO 银行家离职加盟 SMBC
item.description: 三井住友金融集团公司（Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group Inc.）正在从摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group Inc. is hiring a trio of bankers from JPMorgan Chase & Co. to grow the Japanese firm’s collateralized loan obligation platform, as activity in the roughly $1 trillion market has surged this year.】

item.title: 供应过剩担忧加剧，必和必拓铁矿石产量略有上升
item.description: 必和必拓集团有限公司（BHP Group Ltd.）表示，其第一季度铁矿石产量比去年同期增长了 2%，这是因为主要矿商提高产量的举措引发了供过于求的担忧。【原文：BHP Group Ltd. said iron ore output in its first quarter rose 2% from the year-before, as moves by major miners to ramp up production raise the specter of over-supply.】

item.title: 耐克走向户外，寻找新的增长点
item.description: 耐克公司在经历了艰难的一年后，正在寻找新的增长点，准备在全球范围内推动其户外业务 All Conditions Gear，该公司生产防水靴、防撕裂夹克和日用背包等徒步旅行装备。【原文：Nike Inc., on the hunt for new growth avenues following a rocky year, is preparing a global push for its outdoor business, All Conditions Gear, which makes hiking gear such as waterproof boots, ripstop jackets and day packs.】

item.title: 迪尔宣布在爱荷华州和伊利诺伊州的农业不景气时期裁员更多
item.description: 迪尔公司（Deere & Co.）将在爱荷华州和伊利诺伊州再裁员近 300 人，因为农用设备的需求从近几年的生产高峰期开始放缓。【原文：Deere & Co. is laying off an additional nearly 300 people in Iowa and Illinois as demand for farm equipment slows from the peak production of recent years.】

item.title: 债券期货震荡有望重燃被烧毁的国债交易
item.description: 国债期货头寸的平仓将重新点燃债券市场的一个热门赌注，这个赌注已经随着交易员们削减对美联储积极降息的预期而被烧毁。【原文：The unwinding of positions in Treasury futures stands to rekindle a popular bond-market wager that’s been burned as traders pare back expectations for aggressive Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 苹果公司首席人事官离职不到两年
item.description: 据知情人士透露，苹果公司的首席人事官将在不到两年后离开这家 iPhone 制造商，这标志着该公司高管的任期异常短暂。【原文：Apple Inc.’s chief people officer is leaving the iPhone maker after less than two years, according to people with knowledge of the matter, marking an unusually short tenure for a senior executive at the company.】

item.title: 外国人加强对波动剧烈的韩国股票的期权交易
item.description: 多年来，韩国交易所一直试图吸引投资者参与其单一股票期权，但收效甚微。这种情况正在开始改变。【原文：For years, the South Korean exchange sought to lure investors to its single-stock options with little success. That’s starting to change.】

item.title: 棉花收购战的胜利助推德雷福斯交易商在亚洲的发展
item.description: 路易达孚公司（Louis Dreyfus Co.）历时8个月对澳大利亚最大棉花加工企业的收购终于结束，在一场激烈的控制权争夺战中取得了胜利。【原文：Louis Dreyfus Co. is finally at the end of its eight-month pursuit of Australia’s biggest cotton processor, securing victory in a bitter fight for control of the company that pitted the major trader against fellow behemoth Olam Agri Holdings Ltd.】
